Text: please help how can i run ps2 games on sgk 4.40 .4
you need to install the exdata folder using reactpsn in order to play any of my ps2 games.
haven't tested on your firmware though... just make sure your CFW has been updated recently, as not all are compatible with some of the new methods to play ps2/psp games, i have no idea with yours.
where can i get the exdata

sutekh, do you have a ps2 game called chessmaster for ps2 classics?
